mini-chart.title: Title of the card
mini-chart.sub-title: Subtitle text, that will be apprear in the end of line two.
mini-chart.icon: Icon to set as part of sub-title.
mini-chart.subtitle-large: Subtitle large text, that will be visible in the beginning of line two
mini-chart.data: This must be object as per ChartJs data input.
mini-chart.option: This must be object as per ChartJs option input.
mini-chart.gradient: Boolean type of input to instruct that this chart has gradient. Make sure that data prop does not have background as paramater.
mini-chart.gradientSet:
Array of gradients. Can use hex color, rgb, rgba with conbination of string/object as illustrated.
:gradientSet="[{stop: 0, color: 'rgb(255, 248, 0)'}, 'rgba(255, 19, 97, 0.7)', '#424242']"
mini-chart.linearStroke: This is array of numbers that will be converted arguments for createLinearGradient. See more, createLinearGradient
mini-chart.height: Set the height of the widget. Default is 100
